original_title: レズ解禁 先生は渡さない
overview: “Misaki-sensei, I love you! However, she gradually escalates the physical contact with her student Mei. Misaki was aware that the "love" that Mei said was her romantic feeling, but she was unable to respond to her feelings. quit teaching. …and half a year later, something happened.
title: Lesbian Liberation – Sensei won’t give it to me
